name: H4N9M4N
description:
"For after taking much thought, calmly, I came to the conclusion that what was wrong about the guillotine was that the condemned man had no chance at all, absolutely none." – “Meursault”, The Stranger

Created for the Hangman Jam

(content warning for potential eye strain)

notes for mac build:  after you unzip it on a mac, you have to right click on the app and select open and then allow it to run. (thanks scott!)

Credits:

Playtesters:
- branung

- Gabby Petterson

The ASCII look of H4N9M4N is directly inspired from a game called "SKYSCRAPER" by Heather Flowers. Check it out!

Assets used:
- Low Poly Tree Pack by Broken Vector
- ASCII Rendering Shader in Unity by StefanJo3107
- Deep Wobble by Scream Studio
- AMBIENCE NIGHT FIELD CRICKET 01.wav by sengjinn
